about_the_game:
Tile Perfect: Pixel Perfection in Every Slide!

Unleash your puzzle mastery with Tile Perfect, the mesmerizing sliding puzzle game that bursts with vibrant, pixelated charm!

  • Dazzling pixel art: Each puzzle board is a vibrant tapestry of meticulously crafted pixelated wonders. From whimsical landscapes to retro arcade throwbacks, every tile is a tiny masterpiece waiting to be placed with precision.
  • Four levels of mastery: Hone your puzzle skills with four difficulty levels, from beginner-friendly 3x3 grids to the mind-bending 8x8 challenge. Each level offers a unique twist to test your strategic thinking and tile-sliding prowess.
  • Pixel therapy: Let the gentle click-clacks of shuffling tiles wash away your worries. Arrange vibrant squares and discover a meditative calm within the pixelated puzzle.

So, are you ready to embark on a pixel perfect adventure? Download Tile Perfect today and let the puzzling begin!

Unleash your puzzle mastery with Tile Perfect, the mesmerizing sliding puzzle game that bursts with vibrant, pixelated charm!

  • Pixel therapy: Let the gentle click-clacks of shuffling tiles wash away your worries. Arrange vibrant squares and discover a meditative calm within the pixelated puzzle.

So, are you ready to embark on a pixel perfect adventure? Download Tile Perfect today and let the puzzling begin!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04 LTS or higher
  • Processor: Dual core CPU or higher
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2 or Vulkan compatible GPU
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: A minimum resolution of 800 x 600

name: TILE PERFECT

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or higher
  • Processor: Dual core CPU or higher
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2 or Vulkan compatible GPU
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: A minimum resolution of 800 x 600
